mapper.select: Select * From (Select rownum rn, aa.* From ( Select rownum rna, b.*, a.gServTitle, (b.rememSize*a.gservprice) amount From reservation b, gService a Where a.gservno=b.GSERVNO and b.memberID ='${memberId}' and (b.cancel_yn='n' OR b.cancel_yn='N') Order by b.reservdate desc, b.pay_yn) aa ) Where rn between ${start} and ${end}
select count(*) from reservation where memberId='${value}' and (cancel_yn='n' OR cancel_yn='N')
select count(*) from reservation where memberId='${value}' and (success_yn='y' OR success_yn='Y')
select b.*, a.gServTitle, (b.rememSize*a.gservprice) amount from reservation b, gService a where a.gservno=b.GSERVNO and payCode='${value}'

Select * from (Select rownum rn, aa.* From ( Select rownum rna, b.*, a.gServTitle, ( Select count(*) From review c Where b.gservno=c.gservno and b.memberId=c.memberId and b.paycode=c.paycode ) rvNum From reservation b, gService a Where a.gservno=b.GSERVNO and b.memberID ='${memberId}' and (b.success_yn='y' or b.success_yn='Y') Order by b.tourdate desc ) aa ) Where rn between ${start} and ${end}
mapper.update: update reservation set cancel_yn='y' where payCode='${value}'

Update reservation Set memberId='${memberId}', gServNo= ${gservNo}, gNo= ${gno}, payCode='${payCode}', reservDate= SYSDATE, tourDate= to_date('${tourDate}'), pay_yn= '${pay_yn}', reMemSize= ${reMemSize}, cancel_yn= '${cancel_yn}', success_yn= '${success_yn}', confirm= '${confirm}' Where payCode = '${payCode}'
Update reservation Set pay_yn = '${pay_yn}' Where payCode = '${payCode}'
mapper.select: Select * From reservation Where gservNo = ${gservNo} and tourDate = to_date('${tourDate}') and (cancel_yn = 'n' OR cancel_yn ='N')
select count(*) from reservation where memberId='${value}' and success_yn='y'

Select * from ( select rownum rn, b.*, a.gServTitle, ( Select count(*) From review c Where b.gservno=c.gservno and b.memberId=c.memberId ) rvNum from reservation b, gService a where a.gservno=b.GSERVNO and b.gservno in (select gservno from review where memberid = '${memberId }') and b.success_yn='y' order by b.tourdate desc) where rn between ${start } and ${end }
select count(*) from reservation where gservNo in (select gservno from review where memberid = '${value }') and success_yn='y'
